pr_title: Support import true or false as boolean value

timeline.author: chaoyli
chaoyli

replies.bodyText: "Truetest" won't be converted to true  because of is_all_whitespace(), it will return  PARSE_FAILURE. In additional, this is just test the string is true or false ignore case;
replies.author: yangzhg

timeline.author: wutiangan

timeline.bodyText: why you add the "std::isnan(ret.val) || std::isinf(ret.val)"？if result == StringParser::PARSE_SUCCESS, can val be nan or inf ?
timeline.author: wutiangan

timeline.bodyText: StringParser::string_to_bool will consider "1" to false, is it ok?
timeline.author: wutiangan

replies.bodyText: "1" will convert to int  not bool
replies.author: yangzhg

timeline.message: make insert into and load consistent
make insert into and load consistent
